Reviews.Title: “Value for money? Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: MDI256
Reviews.Content: hotel location 10 minutes foot arrive blue mosque hagia sophia basilica tourists searching theyre planning trip tidy clean towels changed daily arent huge huge stay hilton breakfast nice food tasty staff ready questions nice helpful veeery reasonable price stay recommended

Reviews.Title: “great place for a little getaway!”
Reviews.Author: Jenz_nottm
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel friend january 2012 amazed clean nicely decorated location easy main attractions especially tram stop cemberlitas kabatas underground taksim 10 minute walk blue mosque hagia sophia grand bazaar starbucks minibar reasonably priced dont view matter visit istanbul definatly considering returning hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Travel_and_Living30
Reviews.Content: cosy hotel location centre sultanahmet 2 mins walk cemberlitas tram station main attractions city mins walk cleaned towels changed daily breakfast menu pretty basic changed five days stayed staff warm helpful

Reviews.Title: “Great Safe Location”
Reviews.Author: DEBAND56
Reviews.Content: reading critical reviews boutique hotels istanbul provide insight type hotel five star lavish hotels basically converted homes look renting bedroom critiques completely false stayed california hotel found accomodations clean adequate value talked numerous tourist stayed hotels paying double horrible experiences staff california polite helpful breakfast typical turkish bread boiled eggs location absolutely amazing metro airport 5 block station walked historic sights visited grand bazaar morning checked yes blocks perfect safe clean neighborhood wonderful staff

Reviews.Title: “Our home in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: ahmed_usif1
Reviews.Content: location hotel california hotel staff especialy hotel california polite street calm beautiful breakfast rich hotel couples checkin checkout including transfer fast value money suggestions provide bath amenties slippers bathrobes shower caps

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: biatazdz
Reviews.Content: hotel basic cant expect luxury price hotel notice easily furniture tiles walls bathroom doors etcthe cleaned day inlcuding change towels window minus weird waking morning didnt dark surprised coming hotel booking internet manager offered discount nice inform window id disadvantage beforehand breakfast basic day dining neat clean staff nice helpful smiling communicative hotel located 10 minutes main sights steps tram stop neighbourhood safe quiet walk fear night sum decent hotel price simply people dont spend tight budget treat hotel sleep tip reserve window

Reviews.Title: “Dirty bathroom and poor service”
Reviews.Author: IntlGAPeach
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel california friend arrived hotel 11 am overnight ride bus ride cappadocia told waiting guests check shouldnt wait gracious serve breakfast normal time waiting hours waiting check front desk workers told minutes guests finally checked clean cut 20 minutes trying fix hair dryer friend told hair dryer wasnt shower pushed finally gentleman hair dryer urged hurry finish quickly left toilet lid urine splashed seat freaked little door housekeeper didnt speak english clean quickly wiped toiled quickly mopped floor hair previous guests floor afterwards shower noticed hadnt cleaned hair previous guests shower gel bottle top left hotel showers cleaning lady reclean bathroom arrived evening bathrooms recleaned mentioned twice front desk workers offered real apologies sort shrugged shoulders matter stay hotel worst hotel experiences ive trip dirty werent dirty bathroom issue lack response stay hotel ok disappointing

Reviews.Title: “I don't like rooms without windows!”
Reviews.Author: DianaRiga_Latvia
Reviews.Content: location hotel pretty central hotel despite bathroom broken shelves breakfast poor didnt window 30 cm wall feel depressive lil bit staff polite value money

Reviews.Title: “fully recommend for this price!!!!”
Reviews.Author: koilitsa
Reviews.Content: comfortable hotel california fourday stay claimed stench ventilation immediately offered breakfast rich totally okay employees courteous helpful hospitable clean style matter taste hotel situated quiet street near central attractions
